con:soapui-project.name: XDRAsyncRequestInboundTest
con:soapui-project.con:description: This suite tests inbound DS deferred request messages. This suite is standard mode only because it tests audit and policy logic. This suite potentially has duplicate tests with NHINCReceivingXDRAsyncRequestTests. Set the GatewayPropsDir to the config/nhin directory of the gateway under test.
